plugin_libraries.library:
<plugin name="median_double_filter" class="filters::MedianFilter" type="filters::MultiChannelFilterBase">
THis is a median filter which works on a stream of doubles.

<plugin name="mean_double_filter" class="filters::MeanFilter" type="filters::MultiChannelFilterBase">
THis is a mean filter which works on a stream of doubles.

<plugin name="transfer_function_double_filter" class="filters::TransferFunctionDoubleFilter" type="filters::MultiChannelFilterBase">
THis is a transfer filter which works on a stream of doubles.
